Data
Calculate using:
 ∆S = Sf - Si Calculate using:
 ∆S = ∆t × vm Calculate using:
 ∆S = (tf - ti) × vm Calculate using:
 Si = Sf - ∆S Calculate using:
 Sf = Si + ∆S Calculate using:
 S = Si + v × ∆t Calculate using:
 v = ∆S / ∆t Calculate using:
 v = (sf - si) × (tf - ti) Calculate using:
 ∆t = tf - ti Calculate using:
 ∆t = ∆S / v Calculate using:
 ∆t = (Sf - Si) / v Calculate using:
 ti = tf - ∆t Calculate using:
 tf = ti + ∆t Calculate using:
 a = ∆v / ∆t Calculate using:
 a = (∆v) / (tf - ti) Calculate using:
 a = (vf - vi) / ∆t Calculate using:
 a = (vf - vi) / (tf - ti) Calculate using:
 ∆v = ∆t × a Calculate using:
 ∆v = (tf - ti) × a Calculate using:
 vi = vf - ∆t × a Calculate using:
 vf = vi + ∆t × a Calculate using:
 ∆t = ∆v ÷ a Calculate using:
 ∆t = (vf - vi) ÷ a Calculate using:
 ti = tf - ∆v ÷ a Calculate using:
 ti = tf - (vf - vi) ÷ a Calculate using:
 tf = ti + ∆v ÷ a Calculate using:
 tf = ti + (vf - vi) ÷ a
